name: Unity from Scratch: Demo Game
description:
Unity From Scratch

Unity From Scratch is a YouTube video series about how one can move from creating games in Scratch into game development using Unity Visual Scripting language.

I developed this game as an example to develop in both platforms and explain the whole transition one needs to make when switching from one to the other. 

Attributions
  • Kenney Shooting Gallery Pack
  • Carnival Rides Music from Écrivain
  • Sword Hit Heavy sfx from EminYILDIRIM
  • Shoot 5 sfx from Leszek_Szary
